abstract.para: Clean up the &S3; resources that you are done with.

section.title: Delete the Amazon S3 Bucket
section.para: Before you can delete an &S3; bucket, you must delete all objects in the bucket. You should also ensure that logging is disabled for the bucket; otherwise, we will write logs to your bucket as you delete the objects in your bucket.

procedure.title: To disable logging for a bucket

step.para: Select your bucket and then click Properties.
In the Properties pane, click Logging.

procedure.title: To delete the objects in a bucket

step.para: Select one or more objects, click Actions, and then click Delete.
In the confirmation message that appears, click Yes, Delete.
Select the bucket, click Actions, and then click Delete.
When prompted for confirmation, click Yes, Delete.
